rules_text:
When this creature enters, put a zeal counter on target Faerie.
{3}{R}, Remove a zeal counter from this creature: Create a 4/4 red Elemental creature token with haste and prowess. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.
